title: Aplikasi Laboratorium
description: The Laboratory Application is a comprehensive system designed to efficiently manage, organize, and streamline all laboratory operations and administration tasks.

title: Microservices Architecture V1
description: This project is an implementation of a microservices architecture that divides the application into a set of small, independent, and separate services.

title: Microservices Architecture V2
description: This application uses microservices architecture with Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, API Gateway, Eureka, Docker, and Swagger for scalable, maintainable services.

title: Microservices Architecture V3
description: This project demonstrates a microservices architecture built using Spring Boot and Resilience4j, implementing fault tolerance with Circuit Breaker and Retry mechanisms.

title: Microservices: Simple Finance Planner
description: microservice-finance-planner is a backend microservice designed to manage personal financial planning simply and effectively, allowing workers to track income, expenses, budgeting, and savings goals.
